DataPreprocessing module¶

Created on Sat Feb 8 11:21:32 2020

@author: Donovan

class DataPreprocessing.DataPreprocessing(standard_scaling=False, normalization=False, pca=False, components=None)¶

Bases: object

This class object prepares the data for classification.

fit_transform(X_train)¶

This function fits and transforms the data.

Parameters

  • X_train (pandas DataFrame) – The data to be transformed.

  • Modified (Attributes) –

  • ------------------- –

  • sc (standard scaler object or None) – Used to scale features fitted to the data

  • norm (Normalizer object or None) – Used to normalize features fitted to the data

  • pca (PCA object) – Used to perform principal component analysis on features fitted to the data

Returns

X_train – The preprocessed data.

Return type

pandas DataFrame

transform(X_test)¶

Transforms new data before prediction.

Parameters

X_test (pandas DataFrame) – The data to be transformed.

Returns

X_test – The preprocessed data.

Return type

pandas DataFrame
